placeholders.description: The installed version of the Parkour plugin.
The number of active Parkour players.

heading: Player Placeholders
description: These are values with context to the provided Player.

placeholders.description: The Player's ParkourRank (will have colour applied).
The latest Course the Player completed.
The latest Course the Player joined.
Completion status for whether the Player completed the specified Course. Output configurable in strings.yml.
The number of Courses the Player has completed.
The number of Courses the Player has yet to be completed.
The time delay before the Player can receive the specified Course prize again.
The Player's personal best time on the specified Course.
The number of deaths accumulated for the Player's personal best time on the specified Course.
The Player's personal best time, in milliseconds, on the specified Course.
The Player's personal best time, in milliseconds, on the specified Course.

heading: Current Course Placeholders
description: These are values with context to the provided Player and their current Course.

placeholders.description: The name of the Course the Player is currently on.
The accumulated of the Course the Player is currently on.
